definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Disappointments are likely if your mate embarrasses you in front of friends. Partners may try to argue with you;
sentences.chinese: 如果伴侶讓你在朋友面前丟面子你會感到很失望。

sentences.english: Many agreed that the Prime Minister had in effect resigned dishonorably.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲首相辭職實際上是很丟面子的。

sentences.english: Getting angry or raising your voice will create only an ugly, face-losing situation for all.
sentences.chinese: 表現出憤怒和提高音量只會導致丟面子的結果。

sentences.english: Worst of all were the humiliations.
Now, Sex has been very embarrassing to me.
sentences.chinese: 現在，性生活讓我丟面子了。

sentences.english: Disappointments are likely if your mate embarrasses you in front of friends.
sentences.chinese: 如果伴侶讓你在朋友面前丟面子你會感到很失望。

sentences.english: He knew he was wrong, but he would not admit it, for fear of losing face.
sentences.chinese: 他知道他錯了，但是不願意承認，怕丟面子。
